title: So what is Morde now??
body:
he was updated because it was a bit lost as to what role he was.

so now he is a melee AP marksman? how much more lost can you get?

im not opposed to his change at all... yet (mind you i haven't played with or against him yet) 
but i don't get the reason for the change, In my mind hey increased confusion around him not lessened it.

replies.body:
{{champion:82}} is a Champion in League of legends.

I thought everyone knew that?

He is actually broken. Try building titanic hydra first, and BotRK next, and then building tri-force and the rest is your choice... His scaling is so powerful, and his third hit on q is absolutely destructive.
After playing a few games with him it feel like they tried to make him into a support.....

hes not a marksman, hes just an AP or AD carry bot lane.
 
The reason why its good, is mord brings nothing but damage to a team, sending him top/mid takes away from the cc/play making those roles usually bring. taking him bot lane with a support and just pure damage lets him just bring his tankyness  WITH the dps.


its also to help try to break/change the meta

add something fresh to the game, change the way bot could be played. 

Give mord the ability to come back into a high level of play.

something new for players who wanna try mord.

idk, there are heaps of reasons, he is so much more fun now let alone the rest of my points.
hes fethin awful now... basically all i see is a marketing ploy for idiots who will buy him because "morde can control the dragon? thats so kerl ermahgerd"
mordes new role and where he belongs now.
